title: Ticket #4508: Improve debug log messages for negotiator request lists
description:
It is difficult to tell from the NegotiatorLog what is happening with respect to the resource request list mechanism added in #4460 unless D_FULLDEBUG is enabled. Similar to how things look in the log with request counts, we'd like a small change to the NegotiatorLog output so it reads as follows when using request lists: 

   Request 00128.00005:  (request count 1 of 1, bundle 3 of 20)
creator: tannenba
